channel.title: 639 eclipse question... (;
channel.description:
Does anyone have an idea.. on how i could make it so that the server will shout out that an admin or me the owner has logged in ?
If u can give me an idea that would be so helpfull i will rep++ thanks so much guys(:

item.title: 639 eclipse question... (;
item.dc:creator: @magicana89 magicana89
item.description:
@magicana89 wrote:

[quote=“xXSh0ckXx, post:2, topic:444241”]If you got +15 Rep then you can rep other. Derp

Code : [PI]

Go to Client.java And Search this:

if (addStarter) getPA().addStarter();
Under that add this :

if(playerRights == 3) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("<col=2314>The Sexy Owner & Coder has just logged in. <img=2><img=1>[" +playerName+ "]<img=1><img=2>"); } } } if(playerRights == 2) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("<col=2310>An Administrator has just logged in. Feel free to Pm him! <img=2>[" +playerName+ "]"); } } } if(playerRights == 1) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("<col=2341>A Moderator has just logged in. Feel free to Pm him! <img=1>[" +playerName+ "]"); } } } if(playerRights == 4) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("<col=2341>A Donator has just logged in. [" +playerName+ "]"); } } }[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: 639 eclipse question... (;
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

if (getRights() == 2) for (Player p : World.getPlayers()) p.getPackets().sendGameMessage("<img=1><col=FF0000><shad=000000>Admin " + getUsername() + " has logged in."); if (getRights() == 1) for (Player p : World.getPlayers()) p.getPackets().sendGameMessage("<img=0><col=FF6600><shad=000000>Moderator " + getUsername() + " has logged in.");

That’s for a 667, you need to change it slightly which is not rocket science. Just add it to ActionSender.java near “Welcome to +server name”.

Hope I helped & good luck!

Read full topic

Feel free to Pm him! <img=1>[" +playerName+ "]"); } } } if(playerRights == 4) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("<col=2341>A Donator has just logged in.
